thread.title: Nonstudent Passes Out Hitler Valentine's Day Card
thread.title_full: Nonstudent Passes Out Hitler Valentine's Day Card | The Daily Caller

author: Rob Shimshock
title: Nonstudent Passes Out Hitler Valentine's Day Card
text:
5475791 A female visitor (not a student) to Central Michigan University passed out a Hitler-themed Valentine’s Day card at a College Republicans event.
“The grossly offensive action of one individual, a nonstudent, has deeply distressed our campus community and others across the nation,” said George E. Ross, president of the university. “With heavy hearts and great embarrassment, we apologize. To those of Jewish descent, rest assured that we stand with you and vow to continue the effort to educate others.” 
“Unfortunately, a very inappropriate card was placed into a bag without other members’ knowledge,” said the College Republicans on Facebook . “ Unfortunately, a very inappropriate card was placed into a bag without other members’ knowledge.” 
“We in no way condone this type of rhetoric or anti-Semitism,” said the group. “We apologize for any offense, and want students to know that we do not tolerate this sort of behavior.”
The Simon Wiesenthal Center, a Jewish human rights group, demanded that those responsible for the card be expelled.
Negative reviews adorn the group’s Facebook page, which has 1.4 out of five possible stars.
